inlineContent.text: Implement precise seeking and chapter navigation
so users can easily jump to desired positions.
Use seek(to:) method to move to a specific time position.
Move to a specific time using CMTime.
Receive callback after seek completes to update UI.
Move ±10 seconds, ±30 seconds from current position.
moves to exact position but takes longer.
Use wide tolerance for fast seeking.
Use fast seeking during slider drag,
Implement a timeline slider for users
resume at that position when drag ends.
Display thumbnail preview above the slider.
Read chapter information embedded in videos
Display each chapter’s title and start time.
Navigate to that time when a chapter is tapped.
Find chapters based on current playback position.
What happens when toleranceBefore and toleranceAfter are set to .zero?
Moves to exact time position but seeking takes longer
Zero tolerance requires additional decoding work
Zero tolerance moves to the exact position,
What is the optimal seek strategy during slider drag?
Fast feedback is more important during drag.
Use fast seeking during drag, precise seeking when finished
Preview should be available during drag too.

abstract.text: Implement continuous playback and playlist features
using AVQueuePlayer.
